phrases.phrase: Welcome, my friend. I believe you have travelled for a very long time. However, I must warn you of something. Your actions change what you see and how the environment responds to you.

Well… This land once has been inhabited by a wizard. He believed that people should be held responsible for what they do, that the way they see the world should also change with their actions. So if they do something good, then the world they see, should be good. However, if they do the opposite, what they see, should not be pleasant.
Please do not be rude. I am trying to help.
You need to speak to 7 of my brothers. They will help you on this quest. They might give you some pointers on how to go about this. Some of them might give you a task to do in exchange for knowledge.
You see the pointer up there? It will show you where to go.

player-answers.answer: Are you mad? Do you think I should believe in this nonsense?
I’m sorry, I did not intend to offend you.
How do I leave this land?
That’s fine, where should I go?
